title: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings - Enhanced Edition (GOG)
description:
This was taken straight from GOG.com and includes all the DLC, patches and the game goodies. I left out the modding tools as it was 6GB.
If you do not want the game goodies, you can select to not download the "Game Goodies" folder in your BitTorrent client.

Install instructions: 
1. Run "setup_the_witcher2_ee_3.4.0.25.exe" located in the "Game Setup" folder
2. Play, no cracks needed as DRM free
If you like this game, please support the developers and BUY IT! Remember to seed so others can enjoy

WITCHER 2: ASSASSINS OF KINGS - ENHANCED EDITION (c) CD Projekt RED
Release Date: April 17, 2012
Game Version: 3.4.0.25
Protection: None
Game Type: Role-playing - Action - Fantasy
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/the_witcher_2
Language: English

About This Game
About: The second installment in the RPG saga about the Witcher, Geralt of Rivia. A new, modern game engine, responsible both for beautiful visuals and sophisticated game mechanics puts players in the most lively and believable world ever created in an RPG game. A captivating story, dynamic combat system, beautiful graphics, and everything else that made the original Witcher such a great game are now executed in a much more advanced and sophisticated way.
The Witcher 2 was acclaimed one of the best RPGs by the biggest worldwide media outlets:

What's New in the Enhanced Edition:
Professional mod tool - REDkit beta: The REDkit is the best way to craft vast, living worlds Ã¢â‚¬â€œ shape environments using intuitive tools and adapt them to your needs! Create your own RPG adventures and do it CD Projekt RED style!
Additional hours of gameplay: New major adventures set in previously unseen locations, expanding the story and introducing new characters, mysteries and monsters.
New Game Introduction and Cinematics: All new animations and cut scenes, including a new, three and a half minute pre-rendered cinematic depicting the assassination of King Demavend of Aedirn. BAFTA Award winner and Academy Award nominee Tomasz Baginski brings this key historical event to life, setting the stage for the story told in The Witcher 2.

Minimum system requirements:
Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7
Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 GHz or similar AMD
1 GB RAM for Windows XP, 2 GB RAM for Windows Vista and 7
Nvidia GF 8800 512 VR or ATI Radeon HD 3850 512 MB
23 GB HDD space

Recommended system requirements:
Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7, Quad Core Intel or similar AMD
3 GB RAM for Windows XP, 4 GB RAM for Windows Vista and 7
Nvidia GF 260 1GB or ATI HD4850 1GB
23 GB HDD space
